alert.note: Alert for Lake (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 3:25AM EST until November 17 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Lake effect snow occurring. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts possible in the eastern part of the county. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Lake county. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult, including along Interstate 90. The hazardous conditions could impact this morning`s commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snowfall rates will continue through the predawn hours, with periodic snowfall rates up to one inch per hour possible primarily in the far northeastern part of the county. Snow will decrease in intensity as it shifts inland during the day today, before the most organized bands of snow lift north over Lake Erie this evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
